metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21208 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Insufficient data validation in QR scanner in Google Chrome on iOS prior to90.0.4430.72 allowed an attacker displaying a QR code to perform domainspoofing via a crafted QR code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-21208` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 90.0.4430.72-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 90.0.4430.72-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 90.0.4430.72-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 90.0.4430.72-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 90.0.4430.72-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '90.0.4430.72-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
